strapiPost.title: Rogers Approves A Second Entertainment District At Promenade
strapiPost.content:
On Tuesday night, the Rogers City Council approved its second entertainment district - the Bellview Entertainment District at the Promenade.

  • Cheers: Going into effect immediately, local businesses and vocal restaurants restaurants encouraged the adoption of the new district as a way to build community with beer.
  • The boundaries: The area includes the Promenade outdoor shopping area and the businesses across Bellview Road including Rendezvous Junction Brewing Company and Fox Trail Distillery.

Learn more about the new district, its boundaries, and more HERE.
